properties.areaDesc: Christian, KY; Hopkins, KY; Caldwell, KY
properties.headline: Tornado Warning issued January 11 at 7:12AM CST until January 11 at 7:45AM CST by NWS Paducah KY
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a

* Tornado Warning for...
Northwestern Christian County in south central Kentucky...
Southeastern Caldwell County in western Kentucky...
Southeastern Hopkins County in northwestern Kentucky...

* Until 745 AM CST.

* At 712 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado
was located over Cobb, or 8 miles southeast of Princeton, moving
northeast at 55 mph.

HAZARD...Tornado.

SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation.

IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without
shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed.
Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur.  Tree
damage is likely.

* This dangerous storm will be near...
Dawson Springs around 725 AM CST.
Earlington, Nortonville and Mortons Gap around 735 AM CST.

Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include
Hawkins, St. Charles and White Plains.

This includes the following highways...
Interstate 69 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 87 and 108.
Western Kentucky Parkway between Mile Markers 39 and 40.
Pennyrile Parkway between Mile Markers 26 and 34.
properties.instruction:
TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest
floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a
mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter
and protect yourself from flying debris.

CMAMtext: NWS: TORNADO WARNING in this area til 7:45 AM CST. Take shelter now. Check media.
